description: Add attributes to a dataframe or update attributes of a dataframe
documentation:
# Add/Update Attributes

## Description
Add attributes to a dataframe or update attributes of a dataframe.

## Inputs
* **dataframe** (Pandas DataFrame): The input DataFrame.
* **attributes** (Any): A dictionary with string keys to be added to the input DataFrame.

## Outputs
* **dataframe** (Pandas DataFrame): The input DataFrame with added attributes.

## Details
Adds attributes to a dataframe. Adding an attribute with a key, that is already included in the attributes of the dataframe, will update the corresponding value.

**Note:** When wired to a generic REST adapter, the attributes are sent base64-encoded with the key "Data-Attributes" in the header. To process the attributes, the adapter should be implemented accordingly.
name: Add/Update Attributes (DataFrame)
